thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 17 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Wuhan Hiteck Biological Pharma unit receives GMP certificate

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Wuhan Hiteck Biological Pharma unit receives GMP certificate

organizations.name: wuhan hiteck biological pharma co ltd

text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - Wuhan Hiteck Biological Pharma Co Ltd :
* Says its Wuhan-based health tech controlling unit received goods manufacture practice (GMP) certificate from Hubei Food and Drug Administration
* Certificate issued traditional Chinese medicines prepared in ready-to-use forms manufactured by the unit and the valid period is until Jan. 10, 2023
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/HrciHE
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
